statements: DELETE FROM InventoryLevels WHERE current_stock < minimum_threshold;
DELETE FROM InventoryLevels WHERE product_id = 1 AND current_stock < 20
DELETE FROM reorder_notifications WHERE product_id = 100 AND notification_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM inventory_levels WHERE current_stock < 10 AND min_stock_threshold = 5;
DELETE FROM reorder_notifications WHERE product_id = 100 AND notification_timestamp < '2021-10-01';
DELETE FROM reorder_notifications WHERE status = FALSE;
DELETE FROM reorder_notifications WHERE product_id = 101 AND status = TRUE;
DELETE FROM inventory_logs WHERE log_id = 500 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name = 'Supplier XYZ';
